citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:40 pm to
1:10 pm on 16-Mar-17.
Inspector knocked on door and waited 30 minutes at the facility.

narrative:
